name: ScifiArena
description:
Assignment 4 Prototype

Attack the  enemy for items, try to craft ammo with them

WASD for moving

H - fire combat

J - shoot

I - Inventory

Craft Recipe （Simply click on 2 different slots in your inventory）

Rock + Wood = 10 Ammo

Wood + Wood or Rock+ Rock = 5 Ammo

Health Potion 10HP++
